talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Oh! Link!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you so much for once
again saving the domain!

As I'm sure you know, Finley was in
pieces worrying about Sasan, who did
not show up here as planned.
However, thanks to the sludge finally
disappearing, Sasan was able to arrive
here safe and sound!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Finley was over the moon to see him.<sp:5:1:0>
The two have a lot of catching up to do
and have gone off somewhere together.
I am just so relieved that she is happy
once more.<sp:5:1:0> As a father, that is practically
on par with the sludge being gone!
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh, heh... <sp:5:0:0>Please forgive me if I am
oversharing.<sp:5:1:0> Anyhow, back to work I go.
talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Now that Sasan has arrived safely,<sp:5:1:0> my
daughter, Finley, is over the moon!

I am just so relieved that she is happy
once more.<sp:5:1:0> As a father, that is practically
on par with the sludge being gone!
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease_01>Hm, perhaps I should show Sasan how to climb
waterfalls... He must be able to get here should
trouble ever come to the domain again.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh, oops... <sp:5:0:0>I got a little too distracted
there.<sp:5:1:0> Back to work I go.
talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>To be able to make it to the domain
even amid the phenomena... You are
amazing, Link.
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Sasan is also Hylian. He and my daughter
are quite attached, but sadly it seems he
has not been so lucky in making it here.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Poor Finley is very worried. In fact, it is
all she can think about.

<sp:0:2:2:5000>I know she is a young adult, but as her father,
I cannot help but worry that she will go running
off in search of him.
<sp:3:0:2:0401><sp:0:2:2:6400>Oh, oops...<sp:5:0:0> I really must return to
my work.
talk40:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL>I hope you enjoyed the blissful water bed.<sp:5:0:0>
It is already nighttime, so please watch
your step out there!
talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL>Ah, so you're awake, Link.<sp:5:0:0> I hope you
enjoyed the blissful water bed.
talk42:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>It is a special bed that's filled with water
instead of cotton.

It is like being embraced by the motherly
ocean.<sp:5:0:0> The water gently enfolds you in
its all-consuming benevolence...
In fact, our establishment was highly
praised by the princess of Hyrule when
she came to visit the domain.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So, would you care to indulge in the
blissful bed,<sp:5:0:0> which, again, Princess Zelda
herself professed her enjoyment of?
talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> I am so sorry, but it looks like you
do not have enough rupees.
talk31: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:QuestionNormal_01>How long would you like to sleep?
talk45:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_00>Ugh, I have been shuffling all over <sp:5:0:0>
because bits of sludge keep making
their way onto my lovely beds!
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Wait... <sp:5:0:0>Are you here as a customer?<sp:5:1:0>
Even amid the sludge?! 

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Um...<sp:5:0:0> We're open, of course!<sp:5:0:0> And our
beds are perfectly clean!
talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:QuestionNormal_01>How long would you like to sleep <sp:5:0:0>on the
blissful water bed?
talk46:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:LaughS_01>Ha! Wow!<sp:5:0:0> Hylians must be made of tough
stuff to come here on a day like this!

<sp:0:2:2:5000>Does that mean Sasan is tough as well?<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0401>Ah, oops...<sp:5:0:0> I really must return to
my work.
talk33: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>OK then.<sp:5:0:0> Please sleep well until morning...
talk34: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>OK then.<sp:5:0:0> Please sleep well until noon...
talk35: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>OK then.<sp:5:0:0> Please sleep well until nightfall...
talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>Good morning, Link.<sp:5:0:0> You look like you
slept well.
talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Ah, so you're awake, Link.<sp:5:0:0> You look like
you slept well.
talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Enjoy a sleep as deep as the ocean...<sp:5:0:0>
here at the <clr:0000>Seabed Inn<clr:ffff>!
talk38:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>Off you go on your next adventure, Link.<sp:5:0:0>
It is already nighttime, so please watch
your step out there!
talk39:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL>Good morning, Link.<sp:5:0:0> I hope you enjoyed
the blissful water bed.
talk27: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>Thank you for coming here so late.
talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Our regular bed will cost you <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
Our blissful water bed is <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>.
talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Of course.<sp:5:1:0> We are always open, so please
come back again.
talk1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Link!<sp:5:0:0> Welcome.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>We have lost many customers because of
the sludge.<sp:5:0:0> It does not bode well for us.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>And we are unsure where Sasan has gone
off to. My daughter is quite attached to
him, so we are all worried.
<sp:0:2:2:5000>He might be covered in sludge at this very moment...<sp:5:1:0>
I certainly hope that is not the case.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0401>Ah, oops...<sp:5:0:0> I really must return to
my work.
